## Description {#details}

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineschedstrategy">MachineSchedStrategy</a> - Interface to the scheduling algorithm used by <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scheduledagmi">ScheduleDAGMI</a>.

Initialization sequence: initPolicy -&gt; shouldTrackPressure -&gt; initialize(DAG) -&gt; registerRoots

Definition at line 219 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/machinescheduler-h">MachineScheduler.h</a>.

### pickNode() {#ab8f81fac35fcedf80a58ef268409d328}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>virtual SUnit &#42; llvm::MachineSchedStrategy::pickNode (bool &amp; IsTopNode)</>}>
Pick the next node to schedule, or return NULL.

Set IsTopNode to true to schedule the node at the top of the unscheduled region. Otherwise it will be scheduled at the bottom.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/machinescheduler-h/#l00263">263</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/machinescheduler-h">MachineScheduler.h</a>.

### shouldTrackLaneMasks() {#af1f5d487c749cd8b3fe868e48b80a84d}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="virtual bool llvm::MachineSchedStrategy::shouldTrackLaneMasks () const"
  labels = {["inline", "virtual"]}>
Returns true if lanemasks should be tracked.

LaneMask tracking is necessary to reorder independent subregister defs for the same vreg. This has to be enabled in combination with <a href="#a0ee5c4dca10fa653801aa73cf1723f84">shouldTrackPressure()</a>.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/machinescheduler-h/#l00240">240</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/machinescheduler-h">MachineScheduler.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### shouldTrackPressure() {#a0ee5c4dca10fa653801aa73cf1723f84}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="virtual bool llvm::MachineSchedStrategy::shouldTrackPressure () const"
  labels = {["inline", "virtual"]}>
<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/check">Check</a> if pressure tracking is needed before building the DAG and initializing this strategy.

Called after initPolicy.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/machinescheduler-h/#l00235">235</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/machinescheduler-h">MachineScheduler.h</a>.
